mean_cn: adv. 在旁边，并排地，并肩地
mean_en: next to or at the side of somebody or something
word_etyma: along沿着 + side边 → alongside 在…边
short_phrase: alongside each other at the bowling alley
deformation_desc: 三条船尾形成的波纹构成了一个抽象的E。
sentence: The dog ran alongside us while we jogged.
sentence_trans: 狗狗一路上和我们并肩慢跑。
